channel.title: Scape - Dev. Team - [Need Forum Mods+Server Mods]
channel.description:
[b]I currently need Scape Private Server Mods and also I need Forum Mods to, if you want to sign up on the forums go to www.scapeboards.co.nr.[/b]
[hr]
If you're a member of the Scape Dev. Team, please put this in your sig.
[code][b][Scape Dev. Team][/b][/code]
[hr]
Hello MoparScapers, a lot of you know me as Dylan. Some of you. ;P Anyways, I have quit ShardScape and moved on to a new Private Server Project called, Scape.
Anyways on to the big parts, Scape will revolve technically around some of the best coders on MoparScape... Or atleast that's what I am hoping for, it will be based on actual RuneScape, and will be almost identically excact to RuneScape! Interesting, huh? I am looking for coders who've got potential, enthusiasm, and always ready to do a good work and put some effort into a Private Server! I hope to make this project big. I hope you join it with me, if you would like to join please use this form and reply to this thread asap.
* - [u]Must have[/u]!
[code]* Your Real-Life Name: * Email Address: * MSN Messenger: * Desired Ingame Name: * Coding Skills?: * How long you been coding for?: * [u]Example(s)/Proof[/u]: * Position: Comment(s) or Concerns:[/code]
Available Posititons:
- Coder - Administrator - Moderator - Assistant Forum Manager - Forum Global Moderator - Forum Moderator - Forum Maintnence Crew Member
Each person may apply only once. If someone applys more than once, you have [u]no chance[/u] of getting in.
Thank you.
-GoldenShard!
[hr]
[center] [i]*Scape[/i]
[b]Scape Owner:[/b] GoldenShard
[b]Scape Coders:[/b] GoldenShard Sparky_gp (Mrquarter) I am Noob Zenzie Tythus
[b]Scape Moderators:[/b] Boomer216 Nwfd1025 -Open for app.- -Open for app.- -Open for app.-
[i]*Forums[/i]
[b]ScapeBoards Forum Manager:[/b]
Samcanbam
[b]ScapeBoards Global Moderators:[/b]
Rich Dude99 Boomer216 Nwfd1025
[b]ScapeBoards Board Moderators:[/b]
-Open for app.- -Open for app.- -Open for app.- -Open for app.- -Open for app.-
[i]*Other[/i]
[b]WebSite Developer/Owner[/b]
YupolaScape (Head Crew Member)
-Adding more soon.[/center]
